FwkSenCnt.MEANING: (of food or diet) good for health esp because of avoiding over-processing; (of people or habits) following such a diet

ExCnt.EX: In her garage , there are bins of seaweed left over from attempts at a macrobiotic diet .
I had already been changing my eating style over the preceding few years but made an even more radical change and jumped straight into a macrobiotic lifestyle .
In the later years , the macrobiotic community has not really deepened this subject .
